headline: Trump Retreats After Border Policy Outcry

byline: By MAGGIE HABERMAN and MICHAEL D. SHEAR 3:50 PM ET
headline: Families Would Be Detained Together, Not Separated
summary:
President Trump caved to political pressure and signed an executive order that ends the separation of families by detaining parents and children together at the border.

Mr. Trump had for weeks refused to end his administration’s “zero tolerance” policy, saying that the alternative would be to fling open the nation’s borders.

headline: Bloomberg to Back House Democrats With $80 Million
summary:
Michael R. Bloomberg, the former mayor of New York City, will throw his personal fortune behind the Democratic campaign to take control of the House of Representatives.

By siding so emphatically with one party, Mr. Bloomberg has the potential to upend the financial dynamics of the midterm campaign.
